short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jelly Jump! Help our fat unicorn shed pounds on a tempting run, dodging evil fruit jellies determined to ruin its fitness plan!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
- Super-secret gameplay: Perfect for sneaky gaming sessionsâ€”your boss will be none the wiser!
 - Retro 16-bit style: A throwback to the golden era of gaming, with a modern twist.
 - Easy to play, hard to master: Test your reflexes and push your limits to beat your high score!
 - Explosive soundtrack: Energize your gaming with a beat that keeps you jumping.
No download needed (except for the initial one, lol): Jump in and play straight from your browser, anytime, anywhere.

Lighten up your workday with Jelly Jump, the most fun you can have with your browser open and a Jelly in your stomach!
